ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Bah you got a runed cowl for lambent? heh if I brought my necro on I could get lambent quick as can be. Your giving me ideas here heh. Naeeldar ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Bah you got a runed cowl for lambent? heh if I brought my necro on I could
get lambent quick as can be. Your giving me ideas here heh.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 3:40 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Trading Advice


>the last lambent bp i saw auctioned was in north fp for 1300pp. 3-5k is
>nuts. now i did get all the lambent when the quests came out, but i never
>used it and i traded it all (minus helm of course) last month for a runed
>cowl. wonder what you all think of that? took me a couple days to decide
>but i buckled.
>
>Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
>>
>> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>>
>> The other day in Kelethin a level 6 bard twink offered to buy
>> every piece of
>> lambent armor I was wearing ( I have complete set minus 2
>> pieces). He offered
>> me a helluva lot of money for it all. I laughed in his face.
>> Told him that I
>> had been working on completing the quests ever since they
>> came out in the patch.
>> No way was I gonna sell it and do the quests all over again.
>> He bumped his
>> offer by 1000PP. Put him on the /ignore list.
>>
>> Last night was running through EC on my way to Solusek Temple
>> to complete the
>> lambent breastplate quest. Someone was auctioning a lambent
>> breastplate for
>> sell. Sent him a /tell that I was interested in knowing his
>> asking price. He
>> said 3000-5000 PP or items of equal trade. Also told me that
>> he had already sold
>> three breastplates for that price. I would have thought that
>> they sold for no
>> more than 1000PP. Only cost me 270PP to buy the two rubies.
>> Guess these newbie
>> bard twinks have a lot of money to throw around.
>>
>> Galtin of E'ci
>> 30 bard
>
